key.description: The key of the application role.

groups.description: The groups associated with the application role. As a group's name can change, use of `groupDetails` is recommended to identify a groups.

groupDetails.description: The groups associated with the application role.

groupId.description: The ID of the group, which uniquely identifies the group across all Atlassian products. For example, *952d12c3-5b5b-4d04-bb32-44d383afc4b2*.

self.description: The URL for these group details.

name.description: The display name of the application role.

defaultGroups.description: The groups that are granted default access for this application role. As a group's name can change, use of `defaultGroupsDetails` is recommended to identify a groups.

defaultGroupsDetails.description: The groups that are granted default access for this application role.

groupId.description: The ID of the group, which uniquely identifies the group across all Atlassian products. For example, *952d12c3-5b5b-4d04-bb32-44d383afc4b2*.

self.description: The URL for these group details.

selectedByDefault.description: Determines whether this application role should be selected by default on user creation.

numberOfSeats.description: The maximum count of users on your license.

remainingSeats.description: The count of users remaining on your license.

userCount.description: The number of users counting against your license.

userCountDescription.description: The [type of users](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/lRW3Ng) being counted against your license.

platform.description: Indicates if the application role belongs to Jira platform (`jira-core`).
